message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you is $8000.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm thinking of offering $10000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned is $12000 to you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product is $12000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm thinking of offering $11000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned is $12000 to you.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand you're still not willing to meet my asking price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value I place on the product is $12000.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm thinking of offering $11500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned is $12000 to you.
